thread.title: Tony Parker is nerding out on 'Back to the Future' Day with a souped-up DeLorean
thread.title_full: Tony Parker is nerding out on 'Back to the Future' Day with a souped-up DeLorean

author: Dan Carson, Bleacher Report
title: Tony Parker is nerding out on 'Back to the Future' Day with a souped-up DeLorean
text: By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Gaston Gazette By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 3:02 PM By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 3:02 PM Hello, and welcome to another Internet article showcasing Back to the Future -related content on this fine #BackToTheFutureDay we're having. As you'll note, today is October 21, 2015â€”the exact date Doc Brown and Marty McFly plugged into the DeLorean before that fateful trip to the future 30 years ago. This is a big deal to someone like the San Antonio Spurs' Tony Parker, who seems to have been waiting for the perfect opportunity to break out his DeLorean for the cameras. I don't know if Parker actually owns a DeLorean (update: heck yes he does ), but I wouldn't put it past him. With all due respect, he seems like a huge nerd: By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Gaston Gazette By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 3:02 PM
